thread.title: How Much Will That Extra Bag Cost? Fees Charged by the Top 5 U.S. Airlines
thread.title_full: How Much Will That Extra Bag Cost? Fees Charged by the Top 5 U.S. Airlines

author: Benet Wilson
title: How Much Will That Extra Bag Cost? Fees Charged by the Top 5 U.S. Airlines
text:
Gone are the days when your airline ticket covered the full cost of your flight. Fort Lauderdale-based Spirit Airlines started the fees trend when it began charging for checked luggage and almost every other service and amenity available. In 2014, ancillary revenue by the world’s airlines reached 38.1 billion, up 21 percent year over year, according to a report by CarTrawler and IdeaWorks. Ancillary revenue among U.S. major airlines increased more than $2.6 billion, or 18.7 percent. Below is a list of fees charged by the top 5 U.S. carrier.
American Airlines at its Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport hub. Photo by Benet J. Wilson 1. American Airlines Ticketing Fees
Non-refundable ticket change fee: $200
Same-day change fee: $75
Reservation by phone fee: $25 domestic, $35 international
Reservation (ticket issue) at airport or city ticket offices, including. Admirals Club: $35 domestic, $45 international
Unaccompanied minor fee: $150+ tax each way (up to 14 years old)
Baggage Fees
First checked bag fee: $25 (free to most international destinations)
Second checked bag fee: $35
Additional bags fee: $150 each
Overweight bags: $100 for 51-70 lbs; $200 for 71-100 lbs
Oversize bags: $200
Pet Fees: In-cabin: $125, Checked: $200
Frequent Flier/ AAdvantage Fees
AAdvantage award processing: $75 if booked 20 or fewer days before departure
Date/itinerary change: $75-$150 (waived for Executive Platinum)
Redeposit Miles: $150 (all additional award tickets returning to same account at same time are $25 each)
Same-day change fee: $75
Other Fees
Preferred Seats: $4-$139 per flight; "Main Cabin Extra" seats $20-$195 per flight.
Priority Boarding Fee: Group 1 boarding $15 - $40 More » Delta check-in at Hartsfield-Jackson Airport. Photo by Benet J. Wilson 2. Delta Air Lines Ticketing Fees
Non-refundable ticket change fee: $200 (up to $450 on some international fares)
Same day change fee: $50
Reservation by phone or ticket office fee: $25-$35
Unaccompanied minor fee: $150+ ticket fare each way
Baggage Fees
Carry on bag: Free
First checked bag fee: $25 ($0 to international destinations except Canada and Caribbean)
Second checked bag fee: $35 ($40-$100 for some international destinations)
Additional bags fee: $150 for third bag; $200 each for bags 4-10
Overweight bags: $100 for 51-70lbs; $200 for 71-100lbs
Oversize bags: $150-$300
Pet Fees: In-cabin: $125 - $200, Checked: $200
Frequent Flier/ Sky Club Fees
In phone/in person ticketing: $25
Date/itinerary change: $150 (warning! no changes/cancellations are permitted within 72 hours of departure; all miles forfeited)
Redeposit Miles: $150
Same day change fee: $50
Other Fees
Preferred Seats: Varies per flight.
Priority Boarding Fee: $15 per flight
More » United Airlines Economy Plus cabin. Photo courtesy of United Airlines 3. United Airlines Ticketing Fees
Non-refundable ticket change fee: $200
Same-day change fee: $75
Reservation by phone fee: $25
Unaccompanied minor fee: $150
Baggage Fees
Carry on bag: Free
First checked bag fee: $25
Second checked bag fee: $35
Additional bags fee: $150 each (up to $200 on some international routes)
Overweight bags: $100 51-70lbs; $200 71-100lbs (up to $400 on some international routes)
Oversize bags: $200 (up to $200 on some international routes)
Pet fee: $125 in cabin; Checked pets - check current rates here
Frequent Flier/ Mileage Plus Fees
Last-minute ticketing: $75 if booked within 21 days of departure (Free to $50 for frequent flyer members with status)
In phone/in person ticketing: $25
Date/itinerary change: $75 if made 21 or more days prior to travel; $100 if made less than 21 days (lower or no fees for frequent flyer members with status)
Redeposit Miles: Depends on number of miles - Check this chart
Same day change fee: $75
Other Fees
Seat Selection Fee: None, unless you choose an extra-legroom seat.
Other Fees: "Premier access" fee (priority check-in, TSA lines, and boarding) $9 and up per flight.
More » A Southwest Airlines interior. Photo y Kevin Dooley, via Wikimedia Commons 4. Southwest Airlines Ticketing Fees
Non-refundable ticket change fee: Free
Same day change fee: None but any fare difference will apply
Reservation by phone fee: Free
Unaccompanied minor fee: $50 each way (up to 12)
Baggage Fees
Carry on bag: Free
First checked bag: Free
Second checked bag: Free
Additional bags fee: $50 each for 3-9 bags; $110 each for more
Overweight bags: $75
Oversize bags: $75
Pet Fees: In-cabin: $95, Checked: not allowed
Frequent Flier/ Rapid Rewards Fees
In phone/in person ticketing: $0
Date/itinerary change: $0 (but any fare difference will apply)
Redeposit Miles: $ 0
Same day change fee: Depends on type of award and possible point difference
Other Fees
Seat Selection Fee: None
Priority Boarding Fee: Early Bird check-in $12.50 each way
More » A JetBlue Airbus A321 jet. Photo courtesy of JetBlue 5. JetBlue Ticketing Fees
Non-refundable ticket change fee: $75-$150 depending on cost of ticket.
Same-day change fee: $50 for Blue, Blue Plus and Mint fares
Reservation by phone fee: $20
Unaccompanied minor fee: $100
Baggage Fees
Carry on bag: Free for Blue Plus, Blue Flex and Mint fares; for Blue fares, $20 when purchased during web check-in or at a kiosk, or $25 at the check-in counter .
First checked bag: Free
Second checked bag: $50
Additional bags fee: $100 each
Overweight bags: $100 for 51-99lbs
Oversize bags: $100
Pet flight fee: $100
Frequent Flier/ True Blue Fees
In phone/in person ticketing: $25
Redeposit Miles: $50-$100
Same day change fee: $50
Other Fees
Seat Selection Fee: "Even More Space" seats with extra legroom: $10-$90 per flight.
Even More Speed expedited security screening (at available airports) $10-$14 for Blue and Blue Plus fares.
More »
